snippet: The San Francisco 49ers earned a playoff berth Sunday night by beating the Patriots, 41-34, after withstanding a 28-point comeback by New England.
abstract: NFL Roundup; San Francisco 49ers defeat New England Patriots, 41-34, to earn playoff berth; other football scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco 49ers earned a playoff berth Sunday night by beating the Patriots, 41-34, after withstanding a 28-point comeback by New England.

headline.seo: 49ers Lose 28-Point Lead, Then Hold Off Patriots
headline.main: 49ers Lose 28-Point Lead, Then Hold Off the Patriots
headline.print_headline: 49ers Lose 28-Point Lead, Then Hold Off the Patriots
